snippet: After a meeting Monday with President Bashar al-Assad of Syria, Kofi Annan on Tuesday sought the cooperation of senior Iranian officials in trying to rescue his foundering peace plan.
lead_paragraph: After a meeting Monday with President Bashar al-Assad of Syria, Kofi Annan on Tuesday sought the cooperation of senior Iranian officials in trying to rescue his foundering peace plan.

headline.seo: Kofi Annan Meets With Iranian Officials on Syria Peace Plan
headline.main: Annan in Tehran for Talks on Syria Peace Plan
